backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact form submissions in a map with functions to add, list, and fetch submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing implemented features, affected files, components, and related test IDs for image removal and deployment.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend components, pages, and utilities for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining production identifier, pre- and post-deployment checks, troubleshooting, and rollback steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document setting metadata, SEO tags, and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for all pages and wraps them in the SiteLayout root route.
frontend/src/components/common/Container: Simple layout component that applies responsive horizontal padding and centers content.
frontend/src/components/common/GradientB: Wrapper component applying one of several CSS gradient background variants to its children.
Reusable card component with optional icon, title, description, and content area.
frontend/src/components/common/ProfilePo: Empty file reserved for a portrait component, currently containing no implementation.
frontend/src/components/common/RightSide: Empty file reserved for a portrait component, currently containing no implementation.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionCo: Empty file reserved for a portrait component, currently containing no implementation.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionMe: Empty file reserved for a portrait component, currently containing no implementation.
frontend/src/components/common/ShareSite: Component that displays the site URL and provides copy-to-clipboard and open-in-new-tab actions.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: React contact form with validation, state management, and submission handling via useSubmitContactForm.
frontend/src/components/contact/SubmitSt: Displays success or error alerts after contact form submission.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with name, tagline, description, call‑to‑action buttons, and summary stats.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive site header with desktop and mobile navigation using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with brand info, navigation links, contact prompt, and dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper combining header, outlet content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Category filter using tabs to select project categories.
Grid of project cards showing titles, descriptions, tools, and optional links.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillCate: Displays a skill category card containing multiple SkillMeter components.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillMete: Shows a skill name with a percentage-based progress bar.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Project data list defining project metadata including category, description, tools, and links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and helpers using Internet Identity, initializing AuthClient and exposing login and logout functionality.
Provides a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS setup with custom light and dark theme variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/emailValidation.ts: Exports a simple regex-based email validation function.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides utilities to set document title and meta tags for SEO and Open Graph data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with bio content, highlights, and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays the contact form, contact details, and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage hero section and applies SEO configuration.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows portfolio projects with category filtering and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with SEO setup, a list of service cards, and a call‑to‑action section using shared UI components.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Displays categorized skill groups with SEO setup and a responsive grid of SkillCategory components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, colors, animations, typography, and plugin usage for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for building a multi‑page portfolio site.
